sentences.en: Farmers used to thrash their wheat by hand.
sentences.cn: 农民过去用手打麦脱粒.

sentences.en: Harry always invited Charlie when he threw a thrash in his office.
sentences.cn: 哈里在办公室开派对时总不忘叫上查利。

sentences.en: He threatened to thrash the life out of me.
I should like to thrash him within an inch of his life.
I'm afraid you have to thrash out that question among yourselves.
sentences.cn: 我看那个问题还得由你们自己协商解决.

sentences.en: I'm afraid you'll have to thrash out that question among yourselves.
sentences.cn: 我看那个问题还得由你们自己讨论解决.

sentences.en: It's time to thrash out all the problems.
sentences.cn: 是把所有的问题都搞得一清二楚的时候了.

sentences.en: Let's thrash the whole subject out.
sentences.cn: 咱们把这个题目全面地讨论一下.

sentences.en: My poor brother used to get thrashed for all kinds of minor offences.
sentences.cn: 我那可怜的哥哥过去常常因为各种各样的小错而挨打。

sentences.en: Never mind the side issues, let's get down to brass tacks and thrash out a basic agreement.
sentences.cn: 别管枝节问题, 让我们讨论问题的实质,以求得基本一致.

sentences.en: Of course it is out of the question that Johnson should thrash Wolf Larsen.
sentences.cn: 约翰森当然不会痛打海狼赖生的.

sentences.en: She would never thrash her children.
sentences.cn: 她绝不会鞭打她的孩子.

sentences.en: The swordfish, when wounded, jump out of the water and thrash about.
sentences.cn: 剑鱼受伤后, 会跳出水面,身子不断摆动.

sentences.en: There was a pit for the audience to thrash in.
sentences.cn: 那里有个舞池可供观众热舞.

sentences.en: Three shaggy-haired men thrash tunelessly at their guitars.
sentences.cn: 3个头发蓬乱的男人没腔没调地乱弹着吉他。

sentences.en: We must thrash that matter out.
